text: Mockava is a village and railway station in Lithuania on the border with Poland. According to the 2011 census, its population was 59. == Transport == Rail Baltica is running through the area. There is a break of gauge where the railway systems of the two countries meet. To speed up though traffic, a track gauge changing facility of the SUW 2000 variable gauge axle system has been installed to allow fitted trains to pass through the break of gauge at walking pace. == References == Category:Villages in Marijampolė County
title: Mockava
